title: Respond to a Request for Proposals (RFP)
description: A city issues an RFP for the development of a city-owned parcel of land. A development company decides to respond.

tasks.description: Thoroughly review the RFP document to understand all submission requirements, evaluation criteria, and deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a checklist of all required components for the RFP response.

tasks.description: Assemble a project team (architect, engineer, financial analyst) to develop a concept and proposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: A project team is formed and a project plan is created.

tasks.description: Compile the final RFP response, including conceptual drawings, financial pro-forma, and team qualifications, and submit it by the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete and compliant RFP response is submitted on time.
